column5: And I thought you were a scotch kinda guy  Nice GAR!  S.
LOL Funny stuff and AWESOME fish man... I've got to catch myself one of those beauties someday!  Thanks for the report.
THATS FANTASTIC!  Great report AND marketing!  Thanks for the laugh!
Lol nice report sweet fish as usual!
SPAM!!     Some beauty gar!!  Thanks for the spam Bunk.
so it's true   beer does make the ugly ones look better    I might have to pound down some duff and go for a gar too
Haha...thanks for sharing.  What are you using to target gar?  live bait?  I've been invited to target gar this sunday and would like to know what to bring.
"water on the water, beer on the pier", you're not a good role model Bunk
Hahaha...great report! By chance did you get a sponsor?
They all get prettier at closing time.  Nice job.  I went looking for 'em this spring and never even got a sniff, guess I need a case or two.
Ha ha ha!  That was awesome!  At first look I thought I'd beer my way on your boat.

Thanks fellas!  And I thought you were a scotch kinda guy  Scotch for trout and other sophisticated fish.  Beer for brawlers, like gar and muskies.  What are you using to target gar?  live bait?  Learning over the years they'll take pretty well anything surface or just subsurface as long as it'll fit down their throats.  Finding them and presenting the offer is more key.  "water on the water, beer on the pier", you're not a good role model Bunk  No, no no Chris.  Duff beer does not want to hear this kind of negativity. So you're wrong. lol.
Nice gar!  Is Duff available in Canada?  LOL!
